spellcheck

Class AutocompleteOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • spellcheck.AutocompleteOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Autocompleter, VocabularyBuilder

    public class AutocompleteOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements Autocompleter, VocabularyBuilder
    An implementation of autocomplete using a trie structure
    Author:
    Elena Khasanova

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        word - A word to be added

        Returns whether the string is a word in the trie
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • predictCompletions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> predictCompletions(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                           int numCompletions)
        Return a list, in order of increasing word length, containing the numCompletions - shortest legal completions of the prefix string. All legal completions are valid words in the dictionary. If the prefix is itself a valid word , it is included in the list of returned words. If this prefix is not in the trie, it returns an empty list.
        Specified by:
        predictCompletions in interface Autocompleter
        Parameters:
        prefix - - the text to use as the prefix
        numCompletions - - the maximum number of predictions desired
        Returns:
        A list containing the up to numCompletions best predictions

      • size

        public int size()
        Return the number of words in the dictionary.
        Specified by:
        size in interface VocabularyBuilder
        Returns:
        the number of words in the vocabulary
